name: Developer DAO
description: Developer DAO exists to accelerate the education and impact of a new wave of web3 builders. This journey is an indication of the proposed $CODE token distribution. Subject to change!

tasks.name: Create a Web3 wallet
tasks.description: Visit https://ethereum.org/wallets and install a wallet to start your journey into the Developer DAO.

tasks.name: The minter
tasks.description: Every member will receive 400 tokens for holding the NFT at the time of the snapshot.

tasks.name: The collector
tasks.description: If a member holds a POAP from our Developer DAO town halls before Season 0, they will receive an additional 359* tokens. Please note that this score isn't properly calculated at the moment. You'll get 359 points for being a collector -OR- a DAOplomat.

tasks.name: The DAOplomat
tasks.description: If a member voted on either of our first two snapshot proposals, they will receive an additional 359* tokens. Please note that this score isn't properly calculated at the moment. You'll get 359 points for being a collector -OR- a DAOplomat.
